description: Of course! Living in a quiet environment, surrounded by nature and with spectacular views sounds wonderful. We present you a home that meets all these characteristics. In addition, it has a 14.98 m2 storage room ready for use. The house, built in 2008, is distributed efficiently. A corridor separates all the rooms, providing independence and privacy. The living room is equipped with a hot and cold pump and has direct access to the patio, where you can enjoy the impressive views of the Los Santos church. The kitchen is independent and also has access to the patio. There are two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a complete bathroom with a bathtub. The qualities of the house are remarkable. The exterior carpentry is made of climalite anthracite aluminum, the interior carpentry is made of oak, the floors are wooden and stoneware, and both the heating and hot water work with natural gas. This location offers the tranquility and quality of life that nearby towns offer, with all the services and amenities at your fingertips. You are less than 9 minutes (10 km) from large shopping areas and 15 minutes from the center of Alcalá de Henares. Also, the bus stop for line 275 is right at your doorstep. Magnificent designer home in Santos de Humos Engel & Völkers invites you to visit this exclusive villa in Los Santos de la Humosa. It is a magnificent house of 497m² built with large open spaces and swimming pool. Distributed on two main floors and open plan first floor: the main floor with large hall and a living room differentiated into 2 rooms, with access to the porch and private garden. It has a beautiful designer kitchen with island, large windows and porch plus 1 bathroom and 2 bedrooms. On the second floor there are 3 spacious bedrooms with 2 bathrooms and a magnificent master bedroom with en suite bathroom, dressing room and terrace. The first floor houses a large open space for different environments with windows and access door to the pool and a large garage for 2 cars. The house also has a spectacular pool and garden area with a fantastic porch ideal for events. It is an exclusive home with modern finishes and special attention to detail and security. Located in an area with the best views of Los Santos de los Santos de la Humosa, it is a house that meets all the requirements for lovers of comfort, design and open spaces. Los Santos de la Humosa is the highest municipality in the Corredor del Henares. It is located east of the Community of Madrid and has 2,542 inhabitants, an area of 34.9 km². It is 10 minutes from Alcalá de Henares and 15 minutes from Guadalajara. Located just over 30 minutes from Madrid and with very easy access, it will surprise and captivate you with its nature, its spectacular panoramic views and viewpoints, and its valuable heritage. Los Santos is known as the Balcony of the Henares Valley. From this municipality there are numerous hiking and cycling trails, which run through natural sites of great value. You will enjoy unique panoramic views. 10 minutes from Alcalá de Henares where it has several shopping and leisure centers such as El Corte Inglés, Cuadernillos and Alcampo. As for health centers both the Prince of Asturias Hospital and the Francisco Diaz Specialty Center are a few kilometers away. In the surroundings the area offers several educational centers both public and private and kindergarten.

This semi-detached house in Los Santos de la Humosa, a town with a picturesque landscape, next to the A2, with basic services for day to day life and just 10 minutes from large cities such as Alcalá de Henares, Azuqueca de Henares or Guadalajara, is presented as a unique opportunity for those families looking for a spacious and cozy place to call home.  Once you walk through the door, you will be enveloped in an atmosphere of comfort and spaciousness that will conquer you instantly. Completely renovated in 2016, it is distributed over three floors, offering ample space for comfortable living. Upon entering, you will find a hall/hallway that will guide you to the different areas of the house.The ground floor has a large living room with direct access to the patio, providing a bright and cozy atmosphere to enjoy with the family.The independent kitchen is fully furnished and equipped with basic appliances (extractor hood, oven and ceramic hob).In addition, on this floor, we also have a full bathroom with a shower and a pantry, which provides additional storage space. On the first floor there are three large bedrooms, one of them with a built-in wardrobe for optimal storage.The master bedroom has been completely renovated adding the terrace, which has been converted into a magnificent dressing room with a double built-in wardrobe.This renovation has provided much more spaciousness to the room and a second window has been added, which increases the light and space.On this same floor there are two bathrooms, one of them en suite with a hydromassage bathtub, towel radiator and exterior. The renovation also included the installation of the staircase and the opening of the attic, which has been completely renovated and is currently used as a fourth bedroom.The attic has two large closets/storage rooms fully finished under the roof and has paved glass on the staircase, thus taking advantage of all the clarity and luminosity. Outside, the property has a magnificent L-shaped fully paved patio, with automatic door and space for two/three cars.In addition, you will find a spectacular porch with an awning, ideal for enjoying the outdoors at any time of the year.The main door has an aluminum enclosure that provides security and style. The qualities of the home are excellent, with parquet and porcelain stoneware floors, oak interior carpentry, folding PVC exterior carpentry with double Climalite glazing, bars and mosquito nets.The natural gas boiler was replaced in 2023 to provide efficient heating and hot water. The house is located next to the school, municipal swimming pool and its impressive viewpoint, within a quiet and familiar environment, 7km from the A-2, it has a bus line to Alcalá de Henares (275) In summary, this renovated semi-detached house in Los Santos de la Humosa offers a modern, comfortable and bright space on three floors, with a large and equipped patio.Its quality finishes and functional distribution make it an ideal place to enjoy with the family and create unforgettable memories. Los Santos de la Humosa is a quiet and picturesque municipality that offers a rural and natural environment, being an attractive option for those looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and enjoy a more relaxed lifestyle.
